column6:
Dazzler--Alison Blaire, former X-Man--has awakened from her coma only to discover her life is in deadly peril! And even her former fellow X-Men may be powerless to save her as a betrayal within the ranks has left them shellshocked.
Plus: The 2-Page origin of Professor X's cat. drawn by Leinil Francis Yu!
48 PGS./Rated T ...$3.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Jason Keith | writer:Robert Kirkman | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca
